title: Stage Lv8-C5-S29
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Furthermore, the data suggests a clear trend toward improvement.
Nevertheless, we must remain cautious about potential risks.
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 게다가 데이터는 개선 방향으로의 명확한 추세를 시사합니다.
sentences.en: Furthermore, the data suggests a clear trend toward improvement.

sentences.kr: 그럼에도 불구하고 잠재적 위험에 대해서는 신중을 기해야 합니다.
sentences.en: Nevertheless, we must remain cautious about potential risks.

sentences.kr: 그 결과 팀은 새로운 절차를 성공적으로 구현했습니다.
sentences.en: Subsequently, the team implemented the new procedures successfully.

sentences.kr: 더욱이 이 접근법은 비용 효율적이기도 합니다.
sentences.en: Moreover, this approach is also cost-effective.

sentences.kr: 그러나 여전히 해결해야 할 문제들이 있습니다.
sentences.en: Nonetheless, there are still issues that need to be addressed.
Consequently, we need to reassess our strategy.

sentences.kr: 마찬가지로 다른 부서에서도 비슷한 결과를 얻었습니다.
sentences.en: Likewise, other departments achieved similar results.
Ultimately, all efforts led to success.
